tuv.seg: A travers les siècles, les institutions financières ont façonné le paysage financier et influencé l’activité économique.
Throughout the centuries, financial institutions have shaped the financial landscape and influenced economic activity.

L’objectif de cette thèse est de mettre en évidence, d’un point de vue théorique, les limites fondamentales des institutions modernes et d’en déduire les implications concernant le futur rôle de ces institutions.

The goal of this dissertation is to highlight, from a theoretical point of view, fundamental limitations of modern institutions and eventually derive implications regarding the future role of those institutions.
Le premier chapitre propose un analyse des Chambres de Compensation.
The first chapter provides an analysis of Central Clearing Platforms (CCP).

A la suite de la crise financière de 2008, les autorités financières à travers le monde ont mis en place des réglementations imposant la compensation centrale sur la plupart des produits dérivés.
In the aftermath of the financial crisis of 2008, financial authorities around the world implemented regulations imposing central clearing on most derivative products.
Nous montrons que la compensation centrale nécessite un plus grand niveau de liquidité que la compensation bilatérale.
It is shown that central clearing often requires a larger liquidity buffer than bilateral clearing.
Le second chapitre présente un modèle d’apprentissage en temps continu censé
The second chapter presents a continuous-time learning model meant to represent the learning process of an institution such as a central bank regarding a hidden information held by the market.
Le dernier chapitre introduit et analyse le Lightning Network qui est un réseau de paiement basé sur la Blockchain.
The last chapter introduces a specific blockchain-based payment network called the Lightning Network.
Il permet aux utilisateurs de transférer de la valeur de façon instantanée sans avoir recours à un tiers de confiance.
It allows users to transfer value instantly without relying on any trusted third party.
Nous discutons des implications à propos de la structure de ce réseau de paiement ainsi que de sa capacité à prendre une place importante dans le paysage financier.
We discuss the implications regarding the structure of this network as well as its ability to become an important part of the financial landscape.
